slides.script: I forgot my best friend's birthday...for the 3rd year in a row. The brain fog was getting out of control. I felt like I was losing my mind.

slides.script: Stress was eating me alive. I'd walk into rooms and forget why I was there. I'd lose words mid-sentence. My mind was in a constant fog.

slides.script: I thought it was just a normal part of getting older. But while I was struggling, an ancient stress-busting secret was hiding in plain sight...

slides.script: My sister, a naturopath, told me about Ashwagandha. She said this "miracle herb" had been used for centuries in Ayurvedic medicine to melt away stress and sharpen the mind.
slides.image_prompt: Ultra photorealistic image of Ashwagandha roots and leaves on a rustic wooden table, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: I did some digging and found over 200 scientific studies backing it up. Ashwagandha has been clinically shown to reduce cortisol (the stress hormone) by up to 30%!
slides.image_prompt: Ultra photorealistic image of a stack of scientific research papers with "Ashwagandha" and "Stress Reduction" visible on the top page, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: So I tried it. Day 3: I noticed I was sleeping better. Day 7: My mind felt clearer, no more brain fog. Week 2: My coworkers asked what had changed - I looked so refreshed and focused!

slides.script: I shared my secret with my skeptical husband. After a month, he was a believer. "You seem so much more present and calm," he said. "It's like I got the old you back.

slides.script: Now, I have laser-sharp focus at work. I'm more patient with my kids. Stress just rolls off my back. Ashwagandha gave me my life back.
